mapper.select: SELECT pm.name, pt.task_name, pt.task_no, pl.regdte FROM PMS_MEMBER pm, PROJECT_TASK pt, PROJECT_LOG pl WHERE pm.pno = pl.PNO AND pt.TASK_NO = pl.TASK_NO AND pt.PROJECT_NO = #{no} AND pl.status = 't'
SELECT pm.name, pt.task_name, pt.task_no, pl.regdte FROM PMS_MEMBER pm, PROJECT_TASK pt, PROJECT_LOG pl WHERE pm.pno = pl.PNO AND pt.TASK_NO = pl.TASK_NO AND pt.PROJECT_NO = #{no} AND pl.status = 'r'

SELECT DISTINCT pm.name, pp.PROJECT_NO , pp.PROJECT_NAME , pl.regdte FROM PMS_MEMBER pm, PMS_PROJECT pp , PROJECT_LOG pl WHERE pm.pno = pl.PNO AND pp.PROJECT_NO = pl.PROJECT_NO AND pp.PROJECT_NO = #{no} AND pl.status = 'p'
